tool_description: Calculate distances and durations between a set of origins and destinations.
name: TrueWay Matrix
title: TrueWay Matrix

api_list.name: CalculateDrivingDistanceMatrix
api_list.description: Calculate distances and durations between a set of origins and destinations.

required_parameters.name: origins
required_parameters.description: List of origins described as semicolon-delimited coordinate pairs with latitudes and longitudes. Max: 25

optional_parameters.name: destinations
optional_parameters.description: List of destinations described as semicolon-delimited coordinate pairs with latitudes and longitudes. If not specified, an n x n matrix will be generated using the origins. Max: 25

optional_parameters.name: start_time
optional_parameters.description: Time when travel is expected to start. You can specify the time as an integer in seconds since midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC or you can use \"now\" to specify the current time.
